user_question: How can virtual reality be used to simulate a walk on Mars, and what are the key technologies involved?
final_answer: Virtual reality can simulate a walk on Mars using high-resolution terrain data from Mars rovers, realistic physics engines, and immersive VR headsets. Key technologies include 3D modeling software, haptic feedback devices, and motion tracking systems.
